name: Jewel World Star
description:
Jewel World Star - The bursting splash of jewel bubble free puzzle game

Match four or five or more jewels for awesome jewel-rescuing power-ups!, Making long chains of jewels gives you a blaster. Blasters are awesome, So try to match same color and make as four or five match as possible to get the most points and free blasters.

Features of Jewel World Star are:

- 2 play modes (Arcade & Classic) with full 298 levels.
- Beautiful & sharp graphic, funny sound effects.
- Suggestion feature if there isn't any move for 5 second.
- Works great offline as well.
- Free to play

Download and swipe to match the jewels and win.
